page.title: 04BRABOURNE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Brabourne and Smeeth village hall serves the villages of Brabourne, Brabourne Lees,and Smeeth.It is to be found at Bircholt Forstal,between Brabourne and Brabourne Lees. Many activities go on at the village hall.Children of pre-school age can attend a playschool there on Tuesdays,Thursdays and Fridays.Older children take part in dancing classes and twice a year show their skill on the stage for the entertainment of the public in the villages.Teenaged youngsters have a youth club there,whilst adults can attend such clubs as the Gardening Society,with it's seasonal shows,the Women's Institute,the Monday Club,and for older people there is the Darby and Joan Club.
